issue.title: Error in Safari
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Safari ### AdGuard version latest ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Safari ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? apkmirror ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. I saw the issue and found that there was a problem with the adshield in apkmirror. So, after checking the adshield domain, I checked that popup filter works differently in safari. I made an exception to the shield pop-up filter and it worked well. When I turned on the adguard, the domain request seems to be blocked. In safari, I think we need to block the pop-up in another way. So there was no problem with Chrome and firefox, but I think it was a problem because the filter worked differently in Safari. Filters that are only problematic in Safari 2. Screenshots
User rules
Enable user rules
Disable user rules
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
@piquark6046 
The reproduction method is to turn on the adguard basefilter on safari honkailab.com and wait for about 5 seconds to cause this problem.
